name: Sword and Shield (Gintoki1234)
description:
The elder lich and his undead army has taken over the Gin village. Now you, the hero is on a quest to slay the lich and end his rampage. 

Sword and Shield is a First Person Hack and Slash game made using Unreal 5. Use your sword to attack and shield to defend. Kill the elder lich and complete the quest.

Controls:

W,S,A,D - Movement

Left Shift - Sprint

Spacebar - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Right Mouse button - Block
